A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not even sure where to start with this insipid flick\, which is reminiscent of teenage fanfic. While I was excited to see a new story and a new direction for Star Wars\, this wasn't it. While the visuals were superb\, the story was atrocious\, acting lackluster\, plot was horrendous and honestly it was terrible all-around. The Force Awakens set up something that could have been a good story but now I doubt I'll see any of the coming slew of these. It was that bad.
